title: GLAM-Workbench/trove-music
description:
Current version: v2.0.0

Jupyter notebooks to work with data from Trove’s music and sound zone.

See the Trove music, sound, and oral histories section of the GLAM Workbench for more details.

Notebook topics

  • Harvest oral histories metadata – harvests metadata describing the NLA’s oral history collection from Trove and saves the results as a CSV file.

  • Save a list of oral history collections – extracts a list of series from metadata describing oral histories held by the NLA and described in Trove.

  • Download summaries and transcripts from oral histories – downloads all the available transcripts and summaries from digitised oral histories available in Trove.

  • Harvest ABC Radio National records from Trove – harvests, cleans, and saves all the available Radio National data from Trove.

  • Exploring ABC Radio National metadata – shows a few ways you can start to explore the ABC Radio National metadata.

Cite as

See the GLAM Workbench or Zenodo for up-to-date citation details.

This repository is part of the GLAM Workbench.
